verses.name: Psalms 119:151
verses.text: Thou art near, O Lord; and all thy commandments are truth.

verses.name: Psalms 119:152
verses.text: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 119:153
verses.text: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.

verses.name: Psalms 119:154
verses.text: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.

verses.name: Psalms 119:155
verses.text: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.

verses.name: Psalms 119:156
verses.text: Great are thy tender mercies, O Lord: quicken me according to thy judgments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:157
verses.text: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.
